name: div
features: Delivery: FAST & FREE Shipping on all orders
Ergonomic Design: Engineered for a personalized fit & maximum protection
Gel-to-Shell® Technology: Air-activated material transforms from a gel into a form-fitting shield in 30 minutes

Custom Molding Gear: All Gel-to-Shell® products provide a one-to-one, personalized fit for each player
Comfort Lining: Moisture-wicking interior enhances comfort during wear
3D Cloud Mesh: Raised textured base material offers a premium look & feel
